data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Completed
data.Description: Google has confirmed that the August 2024 core update has finished rolling out, taking 19 days to complete. The update was expected to take a month but ended up taking less than 3 weeks to roll out.

data.Title: Google Trends Email Subscriptions to End
data.Description: Google Trends will discontinue its email subscription option for trend notifications starting October 29, 2024. Users will no longer be able to create new trend alerts or receive existing ones.

data.Title: Bing Introduces Interactive Animation for Featured Snippets and Knowledge Panels
data.Description: Microsoft's Bing Search has introduced an interactive animation for featured snippets and knowledge panels. Hovering over the table of contents highlights the corresponding section within the answer box.

data.Title: Google Tests New Map Pin Design
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new design for map pins in its search results.

data.Title: Google's "View Simplified Page" Option: A Red Flag for Poor User Experience?
data.Description: Glenn Gabe highlights Google's "View simplified page" option in search results as a potential indicator of poor user experience, urging website owners to investigate if their pages trigger this feature.

data.Title: Tracking Google's AI Overviews: A Challenge Across Browsing Modes
data.Description: Glenn Gabe discusses the difficulties of tracking Google's AI Overviews, showing how search results for the same query can differ significantly across logged-in, incognito, and Search Labs browsing modes.

data.Title: Google Search Now Supports AVIF Image File Types
data.Description: Google Search has added support for AVIF image file types, a next-generation image format known for its improved compression and quality compared to older formats like JPEG and PNG.

data.Title: Google Testing New Shopping Search Interface on Mobile
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new interface for shopping-related searches on mobile devices. The updated design aims to provide a more visually appealing and user-friendly experience for shoppers.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces Product Category-Level Insights
data.Description: Google Ads has rolled out product category-level insights, providing advertisers with more granular data and analysis for specific product categories within their campaigns.

data.Title: Google Search Experiments with Accordion UX for "You Visit Often" Section
data.Description: Google is testing an accordion-style user experience for the "You Visit Often" section in search results, replacing the previous label-based design. This change aims to improve the organization and readability of frequently visited sites.

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 Introduces Benchmarking Data and Reports
data.Description: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) now offers benchmarking data and reports, allowing users to compare their website's performance against industry averages and competitors.

data.Title: Google Updates Canonical Documentation: No Fragment URLs
data.Description: Google has revised its canonical documentation to clarify that fragment URLs should not be specified as canonical. The updated guidance states that Google generally does not support fragment URLs for canonicalization.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Q&A Feature Disabled in India?
data.Description: Users in India are reporting issues with the Google Business Profiles Q&A feature, suggesting that it may have been disabled in the region. It remains unclear whether this is a temporary bug, a permanent change, or a test for a wider rollout.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Announces Updates
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising has released a series of updates, with a particular focus on search ads. The updates aim to enhance campaign performance, targeting options, and reporting capabilities for advertisers.

data.Title: Google Image Search Enhances "From This Image" Refinement
data.Description: Google has refined its "from this image" functionality within Google Image Search, improving the accuracy and relevance of results when users search using an image as input.

data.Title: GA4 Report Update: Visualize Up to 5 Rows of Data in Detail Reports
data.Description: Google Analytics 4 (GA4) has updated its reporting features, allowing users to visualize up to 5 rows of data directly within their detail reports using the new "plot rows" functionality.

data.Title: SEO Poisoning and VPN Spoofing Used to Spread WikiLoader Malware
data.Description: Cybercriminals are using a combination of SEO poisoning and VPN spoofing techniques to distribute the WikiLoader malware. The attacks involve manipulating search engine results and impersonating legitimate VPN services to trick users into downloading malicious files.

data.Title: Snapchat Expands Ad Opportunities with Sponsored Snaps
data.Description: Snapchat is introducing "Sponsored Snaps," a new ad format that appears in users' chat inboxes without push notifications. This non-intrusive approach allows advertisers to engage with users in a more subtle and organic way.

data.Title: Circle to Search Adds Song Finder and Gemini-Powered TalkBack
data.Description: Circle to Search, a visual search tool, is getting new features, including a song finder and Gemini-powered TalkBack functionality. These additions aim to enhance the search experience and provide more interactive results.
